message:
Here's how you get the URL for a specific tweet so you can then insert it in a convore posting:
1. Sign on to Twitter
2. Post a Tweet
3. Click Profile
4. Locate your Tweet
5. Click on the time stamp link of the tweet. (i.e. about 2 hours ago)
6. This will open up the individual tweet.
7. Copy that URL from the Address bar.
That is how you capture the url of a single tweet.

Notice that this topic has its own URL e.g. 
https://convore.com/frederick/new-media-in-frederick/
and the group URL is simply:
https://convore.com/frederick

This makes conversations easy to share via e-mail, facebook or twitter.
Here's are a few how-to screen-casts I put together today regarding self-publishing your content: http://www.frederick.com/index.php?action=page&id=662
